title: Weekly review. 187th week. The Pilchard fishermen
brief_description: The pilchard fishermen in New Zealand’s Marlborough Sound haul their nets by night. At dawn carrier pigeons fly from the boats to the canning factory with reports of the size of the catch, so that when the boats come in all is ready for processing the fish.
